title: Zelensky says Russia 'will not break us'
description: The Ukrainian president denounces attacks on key infrastructure that left more than a million without power. Also, the two men expected to be front-runners in the race to become Britain's new prime minister -- Boris Johnson and Rishi Sunak -- hold face-to-face talks, and China's President Xi prepares to be given an unprecedented third term in office.
itunes:subtitle: Ukrainian president denounces attacks on infrastructure that left many without power
itunes:summary: The Ukrainian president denounces attacks on key infrastructure that left more than a million without power. Also, the two men expected to be front-runners in the race to become Britain's new prime minister -- Boris Johnson and Rishi Sunak -- hold face-to-face talks, and China's President Xi prepares to be given an unprecedented third term in office.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
